Wilson is currently working at the Housing & Development Board as a Senior Business Analyst by day. He is part of the Data Science Team under the Board's Estate Administration & Property Group.

By night, he transforms into a part-time student pursuing a Master of Information Technology in Business at Singapore Management University. Beyond that, what little pockets of free time left is spent picking up tennis in an attempt to live up to his given name.
